title: Diversity in history
itunes:title: Diversity in history
itunes:subtitle: Olivette Otele, who recently became Britain’s first black female professor of history, joins Dr Sadiah Qureshi of the University of Birmingham to discuss race and equality in the British historical profession
description:
Olivette Otele, who recently became Britain’s first black female professor of history, joins Dr Sadiah Qureshi of the University of Birmingham to discuss race and equality in the British historical profession

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
